name: Jua Cali
description: '''Paul Julius Nunda''' (born 12 September 1979), better known by his stage name '''Jua Cali''', is a [[Kenyan]] rapper and record producer. In 2000, together with record producer [[Clemo]], he founded [[Calif Records]] where he has been ever since, producing music which dominated [[East African music]] alongside [[Jose Chameleone]] of Uganda and [[Lucas Mkenda|Mr. Nice]] of Tanzania. Jua Cali performs in [[Swahili language|Swahili]] and [[Sheng (linguistics)|Sheng]] in a popular Kenyan style of rapping called [[genge]].
